duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide exceptional patient care in the ER, ICU, Med Surg, Telemetry, Infusion, GI/Endo, and other specialties.
Collaborate with healthcare team members to foster a supportive and caring environment for patients.
Administer medical treatments and interventions with precision and care.
Maintain accurate patient records and documentation in accordance with healthcare standards.
Participate in continuous learning and development to enhance nursing skills and knowledge.

education_certification.credential: Active MA RN license is required.
Minimum of 2+ years of nursing experience.
A passion for delivering exceptional patient care and fostering teamwork.
